name: Speed City Driving: Master Car
description:
Speed City Driving: Master Car is the open world city driving game as the user will be provided with the best racing car to be driven in extremely beautiful and spacious city. Drive more than thirty super sports cars as the user will compete in varis races like rally races, track race, one on one drag race and various other races. The most exciting feature of the game is that user can drive the car in free mode which means the whole city is yours and you can take the car where you want to and there will be no limit. Explore the world with best stunt ramps and raised platforms perform jumps and go aerial. Drift and drag the hot wheels in this traffic racing game as the user will drive on city highway rush.

Features:
Complete missions
Stunning 3D Graphics
Realistic open world environment
Superb cars to choose from
Smooth and realistic car handling
Rich realistic traffic on roads.
